question:
Consider the following statements about the Modified Industrial Infrastructure Upgradation Scheme:
  1. It is a demand driven scheme that focuses on Brownfield as well as Greenfield infrastructure projects
  2. The central government provides 50% of the infrastructure cost as a grant to states (plain areas) with a ceiling of Rs. 50 crore
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The major objective of the Modified Industrial Infrastructure Upgradation Scheme is to enhance the competitiveness of the industry by providing quality infrastructure to catalyse the industry. The project is a demand-driven project and focuses on Brownfield as well as Greenfield Projects. Projects under the MIIUS are being implemented by the State Implementing Agency (SIA) of the State Government. Under this scheme, Central Grant up to 50% of the project cost with a ceiling of Rs.50.00 crore is provided with at least 25% contribution of State Implementing Agency and in case of North Eastern States, the central grant and minimum contribution of the SIA are up to 80% and 10% respectively.
